name: Final Light (QuestTaker, AJuicyPineapple3114, Calactic, AoQ)
description:
Built For Quest
In this story driven horror game you are working in a mineshaft deep underground. As your boss lectures you around the generator powering the mine suddenly dies. All you have is one flare for light. Your boss can fix the generator, but he will need some help. You must venture out into the pitch black void to pick up various items littered through out the mine. Your journey will be wrought with challenge, but you must survive. Will you get out, or will you succumb to whatever creature lurks in the depths?
